configure.p: The TimedPlotter actor reads one or more double tokens via its input multiport and plots each as a separate data set each time the actor iterates. The actor displays the graph on the screen. The horizontal axis represents time.

property.name: port:input
property.configure: A multiport that accepts double tokens that will be plotted over time.

property.name: prop:fillOnWrapup
property.configure: Specify whether to rescale the plot so that all data is visible. By default, the actor scales the plot to fill the display area.

property.name: prop:startingDataset
property.configure: The starting dataset number. The value must be a non-negative integer. The default is 0.

property.name: prop:legend
property.configure: Annotations that will be displayed with the plot graph. Specify a comma-separated list of values that correspond to the input data sets (e.g., rainfall, temperature, elevation).
